name: HP 15.6" TouchSmart Laptop PC with AMD Quad-Core A6-6310 Processor, 4GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, Touchscreen and Windows 8.1

reviews.name: HP 15.6" TouchSmart Laptop PC with AMD Quad-Core A6-6310 Processor, 4GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, Touchscreen and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: Bought this in purple for my daughter for Back to School and she absolutely loves it. Great NB for the price!!
reviews.title: Great purchase

reviews.name: HP 15.6" TouchSmart Laptop PC with AMD Quad-Core A6-6310 Processor, 4GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, Touchscreen and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: Not computer savvy enough to be technical but this is one sharp looking computer. The graphics are colorful and clear. Love the touchscreen.
reviews.title: Love my purple HP

reviews.name: HP 15.6" TouchSmart Laptop PC with AMD Quad-Core A6-6310 Processor, 4GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, Touchscreen and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son for his birthday and he absolutely loves it. Price was great and the deep dark purple is beautiful.
reviews.title: Great Screen Size, Vibrant Colors, Fast

reviews.name: HP 15.6" TouchSmart Laptop PC with AMD Quad-Core A6-6310 Processor, 4GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, Touchscreen and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: Perfect upgrade laptop for my uses: internet browsing, watching videos/listening to music, office programs, etc. Love the touchscreen option, the full keyboard and the color options! Battery life seems good (much better than my nearly 10-year-old previous laptop). Lightweight and slender, so easy to transport.
reviews.title: Great basic laptop

reviews.name: HP 15.6" TouchSmart Laptop PC with AMD Quad-Core A6-6310 Processor, 4GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, Touchscreen and Windows 8.1
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I wish would be a lighter purple. It's so dark it might as well be black.
reviews.title: It's Purple
